welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Romano di Lombardia, a charming city in Northern Italy known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but connection may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
